channel.title: crontab on this.isMin.uk

item.title: editor없이 crontab에 추가하는 방법
item.description: javascript</br>crontab -l > /tmp/cron</br>echo "* * * * * echo hello" >> /tmp/cron</br>crontab /tmp/cron</br>rm /tmp/cron crontab file 파일을 읽어서 crontab에 설치함 (덮어쓰기됨) 출처:https://stackoverflow.com/questions/878600/how-to-create-a-cron-job-using-bash-automatically-without-the-interactive-editor
